---

title: "setup"

description: "Setup remote caching"

---



## Usage

```bash
omni cache remote setup [OPTIONS]
```

---

## Options

### `-b`, `--api-base-url`

The endpoint base URL of the remote cache server

- **Required:** Yes

### `-a`, `--api-key`

The API key of the remote cache server

- **Required:** Yes

### `-t`, `--tenant`

The tenant code of the remote cache server

- **Required:** Yes

### `-o`, `--org`

The organization code of the remote cache server

- **Required:** Yes

### `-w`, `--ws`

The workspace code of the remote cache server

- **Required:** Yes

### `-e`, `--env`

The environment code of the remote cache server

- **Required:** No

### `-s`, `--secure`

Encrypt the remote cache configuration file

- **Required:** No

- **Default:** `false`

- **Possible values:** `true`, `false`

---

## Examples

```bash
omni cache remote setup [OPTIONS]
```

---
